item.title: Student
item.description: Accessed the documentation for a command with git [command] --help

item.title: Apprentice Socialite (Level 1)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Apprentice Seamstress (Level 1)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Author (Level 4)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Stone Mason (Level 4)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Apprentice Goldsmith (Level 1)
item.description: Reviewed patches before committing with git diff --cached.

item.title: Historian (Level 4)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Apprentice Collector (Level 1)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Apprentice Merchant (Level 1)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Apprentice Gipsy (Level 2)
item.description: Create, list, delete a tag signed with GPG using git tag

item.title: Apprentice Hunter (Level 2)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Apprentice Hunter (Level 1)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Apprentice Plumber (Level 1)
item.description: Use the internal plumbing commands of git.

item.title: Apprentice Product Manager (Level 3)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Apprentice Product Manager (Level 2)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Baptised
item.description: Set global user name using git config.

item.title: Homeowner
item.description: Set global email address using git config.

item.title: Apprentice Banker (Level 2)
item.description: Join two or more development histories together with git merge.

item.title: Apprentice Author (Level 3)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Apprentice Gipsy (Level 1)
item.description: Create, list, delete a tag signed with GPG using git tag
